	We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented to join our engineering and project team in Abuja.

	Familiarity with AutoCAD, Revit, or other design software.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Good communication and teamwork abilities.
	Willingness to work on-site and adapt to field conditions.


Method of Application

Civil Engineer - NYSC (Female) Job at Handyman Daige Properties




        
    

        
        Handyman Daige Properties is a private company in Abuja offering real estate development services. We prioritize delivering customized homes that meet our clients requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer - NYSC (Female)

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented to join our engineering and project team in Abuja.
	This internship provides practical exposure to site supervision, structural design, and project coordination on real-world construction and infrastructure projects.


Responsibilities


	Assist in the design, planning, and execution of civil engineering projects.
	Support site engineers in supervising construction activities and ensuring compliance with specifications.
	Assist in conducting site inspections, take measurements, and prepare progress reports.
	Assist in preparing BOQs, cost estimates, and technical documentation.
	Assist in maintaining project records, drawings, and documentation.
	Use AutoCAD or similar tools to update and revise engineering drawings.
	Assist in collaboratingwith contractors, vendors, and internal teams to ensure smooth project delivery.
	Other assigned duties.


Requirements


	B.Eng Degree in Civil Engineering (currently enrolled in NYSC).
	Basic knowledge of structural design and construction principles.
	Familiarity with AutoCAD, Revit, or other design software.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Good communication and teamwork abilities.
	Willingness to work on-site and adapt to field conditions.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: victoria.negedu@handymandaige.com using "Civil Engineer (female)" as the subject of the email.

Job Position: Procurement Officer

	We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Procurement Officer to manage the company’s procurement and supply chain operations.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for sourcing vendors, negotiating contracts, expediting purchase orders, and ensuring cost-effective and timely delivery of goods and services.
	This role requires a strong understanding of procurement processes within the Oil & Gas/EPC sector.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage the procurement cycle from requisition to delivery.
	Prepare, review, and expedite purchase orders to guarantee timely supply.
	Source and evaluate vendors while maintaining strong supplier relationships.
	Negotiate favorable terms and contracts to maximize cost savings.
	Monitor and manage inventory, ensuring availability of critical items.
	Collaborate with finance to reconcile invoices and ensure timely vendor payments.
	Maintain accurate procurement records, reports, and documentation.
	Ensure compliance with company policies, industry standards, and regulations.
	Support budget planning and cost-control measures.

	B.Sc. in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	3–5 years of proven experience as a Procurement Officer or in a similar role.
	Experience in Oil & Gas / EPC industry is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of procurement best practices, vendor management, and contract negotiation.
	Proficiency in procurement and ERP software.
	Advanced proficiency in MS Excel and reporting.
	Excellent communication, analytical, and negotiation skills.
	Professional certification (CIPS or equivalent) is a strong advantage.


Salary
N300,000 - N400,000 Monthly.

Method of Application

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Officer",
  "description": "Eclat Human Resource Consulting is a specialized and progressive management firm headquartered in Abuja, Nigeria. Our focus is to enable our clients to achieve their desired outcomes by providing them with bespoke workable systems, structures, and people.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
The ideal candidate will (but is not limited to):


	Supervise the implementation of telecommunications projects, including network expansion, infrastructure upgrades, and new technology deployments.
	Coordinate with internal teams and external vendors to ensure project requirements are met on time and within budget.
	Manage project timelines and budgets, tracking expenses and resource allocation to optimize project efficiency.
	Ensure compliance with industry regulations and safety standards throughout the project lifecycle.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and address project risks, escalating issues as necessary to ensure timely resolution.
	Communicate project status updates to stakeholders, providing regular reports on progress, milestones, and key performance indicators.
	Participate in project planning and strategy sessions, contributing ideas and recommendations to improve project outcomes.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Telecommunications, Electrical Engineering, or related field.
	Minimum of 2 - 3 years of experience in telecommunications project management.
	Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is a plus.
	Comprehensive knowledge of the telecommunications industry, including familiarity with network technologies, equipment, and service offerings.
	Strong project management skills, with the ability to effectively plan, organize, and execute complex projects.
	Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
	Proficiency in the Microsoft Office suite and project management tools.


Required Competencies:

title: Job Vacancies at Just Brand It Limited
content:
Just Brand It Limited - We are Just Brand It, a 360 creative agency with core competencies in developing Corporate Visual Identity Systems (CVIS), Concept Generation and Brand Management Strategies. Our goal is to provide all round brand solutions to our customers. We are built on four pillars which are Brand Communication, Designs as a service, Promotional gift items and Print and Fabrication.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Business Growth Executive

Job Location: Palmgrove, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a results-driven Business Growth Executive to join our dynamic branding and advertising team.
	The ideal candidate will be passionate about building strong client relationships, spotting growth opportunities, and driving revenue through strategic business development.
	You will play a key role in expanding our client base, maintaining client satisfaction, and ensuring our services remain relevant in an ever-evolving market.


Key Responsibilities


	Gain an in-depth understanding of the company’s products, services, and value propositions.
	Source and secure new clients through direct outreach, networking, referrals, and team collaboration.
	Attend industry events and networking activities to identify and engage with prospective clients.
	Maintain strong, long-term relationships with existing clients to ensure loyalty and retention.
	Identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling additional services to clients.
	Prepare compelling business proposals and contracts to drive revenue growth.
	Negotiate effectively with clients to secure mutually beneficial terms.
	Analyze client feedback and recommend improvements to enhance service delivery.
	Stay informed on industry trends, consumer behavior, and competitor activities to ensure service relevance.
	Meet and exceed set KPIs and sales targets.
	Develop and execute growth strategies, tactics, and action plans that deliver measurable results.
	Understand the target market and align strategies to customer needs and preferences.


Requirements


	Proven experience in business development, sales, or account management (experience in branding/advertising is a plus).
	Strong networking, communication, and negotiation skills.
	Goal-oriented, self-motivated, and able to work both independently and collaboratively.
	Excellent proposal writing and presentation skills.
	Strong analytical and market research abilities.


Salary
N250,000 Monthly. 

Application Closing Date: 19th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application to: careers@justbrandit.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Quality & Order Manager

Job Location: Palmgroove, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Quality and Order Manager to oversee our order fulfillment, inventory, and procurement processes.
	This role is responsible for ensuring the highest quality standards, accurate order delivery, efficient inventory management, and effective vendor relationships.
	The ideal candidate is a proactive leader with strong problem-solving skills and a passion for customer satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and manage quality control procedures across fulfillment operations, including inspections and audits.
	Oversee inventory planning, stock rotation, and optimization strategies to ensure availability and accuracy.
	Manage the end-to-end order fulfillment process, ensuring timely and accurate delivery.
	Supervise procurement activities including vendor selection, supplier performance, and contract management.
	Monitor performance metrics, generate reports, and implement continuous improvement initiatives.
	Collaborate with customer service to resolve order-related issues and address customer feedback.
	Provide leadership and direction to unit managers in procurement, fulfillment, inventory, and quality control.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree/HND in relevant academic field
	Minimum 3 years of experience in quality control, order fulfillment, inventory, or procurement, with leadership experience.
	Strong knowledge of quality management, inventory systems, and procurement best practices.
	Proficiency in ERP systems and MS Office tools.
	Excellent leadership, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
	Strong communication and customer service orientation.


Salary
N250,000 per month. 

Application Closing Date: 23rd September, 2025. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application to: careers@justbrandit.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Fulfillment & Inventory Officer

Job Location: Palmgroove, Lagos

Job Description


	The Fulfillment and Inventory Officer is responsible for leading and managing the entire order fulfillment process, ensuring timely and accurate delivery of products to customers.
	This role will oversee inventory management, picking and packing operations, shipping logistics, identifying and resolving any issues to optimize efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities
Inventory Management:


	Oversee inventory levels, including forecasting demand and managing stock rotation to minimize stockouts and overstocking.
	Implement inventory optimization strategies to maintain accurate stock counts and improve warehouse efficiency
	Monitor inventory performance metrics and identify areas for improvement.


Order Fulfillment Operations:


	Manage the picking and packing process, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in order fulfillment.
	Monitor and optimize shipping timelines to meet delivery deadlines.


Required Skills and Qualifications


	HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Supply Chain Management, Operations Management, or related field
	Proven experience in fulfillment management role within a warehouse or distribution centre
	Strong analytical skills with proficiency in data analysis and reporting
	Excellent organizational and time management skills
	Ability to lead and motivate a team
	Strong communication and problem-solving skills
	Attention to details and multitasking skills
	Experience working in a printing/ branding company is an added advantage


Application Closing Date: 24th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application to: careers@justbrandit.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
